description: {"blocks":[{"key":"24v4p","text":"This protocol details the general preparation of K562 cells for imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1fg0s","text":"Culture K562 cells at    and 5% CO2 in RPMI containing 10% FBS,   sodium pyruvate,   penicillin,    streptomycin,    L-glutamine,    non-essential amino acids, (all from Gibco) and   plasmocin (InvivoGen).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":97,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":114,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":130,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":181,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"78p35","text":" cells are maintained between 1x105 and 1x106 cells/mL, passaging when reaching confluency (1x106 cells/ml) or otherwise renewing media every 2-3 days.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"37lpn","text":"For imaging experiments, seed the cells on fibronectin (Sigma Aldrich) 35mm imaging dishes (MatTek) at a concentration of 2x105 cells per dish in RPMI without antibiotics. Allow cells to attach    at    and 5% CO2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":126,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":194,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":200,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6v57j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"A47577E02D6611EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9B2B62D02D6611EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8lgin","text":"After cells attach, replace media with RPMI supplemented with hemin (Sigma Aldrich) dissolved in DMSO to a final concentration of   . Transfect transiently with plasmids by adding FuGene 4K (Promega) and incubate   . After the overnight incubation, replace the media with new media containing the same factors of hemin and (where applicable) transfection reagent and plasmids, and incubate   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":213,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":390,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8k0kl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"30","error_concentration":false,"guid":"F05D62302D6611EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"6D90C6702D6711EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"BD8426E02D6711EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0aam","text":"Following the 2 days of transfection/hemin treatment, prepare the cells for imaging. Where applicable, add Halo ligand and incubate for    at   , 5% CO2. Replace with new RPMI media (supplemented at   hemin if differentiating cells) prior to imaging. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":136,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":142,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":199,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9viku","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6847r","text":"If using TMRE (Cayman Chemical, TMRE Mitochondrial Membrane Potential Assay Kit), add prior to imaging at a final concentration of    TMRE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1gld6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"07779EC02D6911EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"863C6DE02D6811EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"30","error_concentration":false,"guid":"9ED1EAB02D6811EE8FA793D554F57F29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"200","error_concentration":false,"guid":"B42F96102FCE11EEAD5A77A80989FFF2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1he","text":"Perform spinning-disk confocal microscopy using an Andor Dragonfly system equipped with a plan apochromat objective (63×, 1.4 NA, oil) and a Zyla scientific CMOS camera. Cells are imaged at    and 5% CO2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":190,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"46E362302FBF11EE84B28BD808164AE4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
